subject: Order SSN4260
description_text:
Hello, I ordered the Hall handbrake, along with the HS PRO shifter. The
handbrake along with the desk clamp arrived, but not the shifter.

conversations.body_text: Hi Britton Seadon,  ​The HS Pro is expected to be shipped between December 20 and 22.

Hello, is there an update on my order? In terms of shipping

On Sat, Dec 20, 2025, 8:10 a.m. service@simsonn.com

Hello,
My order shows Delivered on December 19, but I only received the handbrake.
The HS Pro Shifter has not arrived, and I have not received a separate
tracking number.
Please provide the shifter’s tracking number, or confirm that it has not
shipped and give a specific ship date.
As the order is marked delivered, I will need this resolved to avoid
opening a partial non-delivery dispute.
Thank you.

On Tue, Dec 30, 2025, 12:37 a.m. Britton Seadon <brittontseadon@gmail.com>
wrote:

> Hello, is there an update on my order? In terms of shipping
>
> On Sat, Dec 20, 2025, 8:10 a.m. service@simsonn.com

Hi Britton Seadon,  I apologize for not responding to you promptly. I have confirmed that your package has been delivered. Have you received it?  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=JSELI0241859690YQ,JSELP2439750602YQ

I have not received it.

On Fri, Jan 16, 2026, 3:09 a.m. service@simsonn.com
